column4: it happens on other sites as well, I'm trying to find them but I think it has to do with the language or programming gmail uses.
it works fine on regular html sites
I'm not using dial-up, I have FiOS
hmmm... don't know what to say how old is PC?
PC is a laptop on a three year old system
I'd hope I'm connected to the net or how else am I talking to you guys and able to browse others sites ( :-) )
sorry but I can't help you much.
